trs: He saw that everyday, three pigeons would come down from heavens, and as they reached the ground, they would shake themselves, shed the pigeon skins and put it a aside, and three beautiful girls would come out from (the skins), they would collect \textit{Potentilla anserina}, and in the evening, they would take the \textit{Potentilla}, wrap themselves in their pigeon skin, shake themselves and disappear in heavens one after the other.' (07-deluge, 31-38)

src: ɕ-tu-ru-a ŋu tɕe, tɯrme ɲɯ\redp{}ɲɯ-ŋu nɤ, a-ku, nɤki, tu-sɤŋoʁŋoʁ-a ŋu tɕe tɤ-ɣi,

src: aʑo kɯ-kaβ ɕe-a ra

src: kɯ-maqʰu qʰe tɯ-ɕɣa ɲɯ-mŋɤm

src: <jiaoma> nɯ ɲɯ-mpɕɤr

src: ɲɯ-tɯ-mkʰɤz

src: aʑo a-pʰe ``nɤʑo ju-tɯ-ɕe ra" ɲɯ-ti-nɯ.
trs: They said to me: `You have to go.'' (2010-09, 104)

src: nɯ tɤ-ŋu tɕe tɕe, si lú-wɣ-ɣɤjɯ, smi a-tɤ-wxti tɕe ɲɯ-pʰɤn
trs: (He thought:) `In this case, if (I) add more firewood, and if the fire is bigger, it should work.' (150827 taisui-zh, 63)

src: kɯre ku-rɤʑi-a
trs: I am here.' (heard in context)

src: kutɕu ku-rɤʑi-a ɲɯ-ɬoʁ
trs: I have to stay here.' (28-qAjdoskAt, 78)

src: kɯ-ɤrqʰi kɤ-ɕe mɯ-ku-cʰa-a
trs: I cannot go very far.' (for now, due to an accident; conversation 17-09-21)

src: ɕa ʁɟa ʑo ku-o<nɯ>sɯ-ndza-j ma fsapaʁ ɯ-tɯ-si ɯ-grɤl maŋe.
trs: (These days) we are eating only meat, as (domestic) animals have been dying in great numbers (due to a disease).' (2003 kandZislama, 132)

src: <kuabao> ɯ-spa ci ku-taʁ-a
trs: I am weaving a satchel.' (conversation, 14-11-25)

src: a-wi cʰo a-wa ni nɤʑo nɤ-ndʐa kɯ wuma ʑo ku-nɯsɯmɯzdɯɣ-ndʑi tɕe
trs: Grandmother and Father are very worried because of you.' (150819 haidenver-zh, 494)

src: tɕʰi ku-tɯ-nɤme?
trs: What are you doing (now, these days)?' (heard in context)

src: alan kɯ ji-pɤri ku-osɯ-βzu.
trs: Alan is preparing the dinner for us (right now).' (conversation, 15-01-02)

src: pɤjkʰu kɯnɤ ɯʑo kɯ ku-oz-nɤma ɕti ma pɤjkʰu mɯ-ku-cʰa-a wo.
trs: Even now, he is still doing (the housework), as I am still unable (to do it, due to an accident).' (conversation, 17-09-01)

src: tham a-pɯ-ŋu, tu-ndze-a maka mɤ-cha-a
trs: Now, I cannot eat (the fruit of the \textit{Ribes stenocarpum}) at all (anymore, because it is too sour, unlike when the speaker was a child and did not mind about the sourness).' (18-NGolo, 22)

src: mɯ-ku-otɯɣ-a
trs: I have not meeting him (these days).' (conversation 16-03-10)

src: ku-scit-i
trs: We are happy.' (conversation, in a response to a new years' greeting)

src: nɯtɕu ɲɯ-scit-a ɕti li tɕe tɕe a-zda ri ɲɯ-pe-nɯ,
trs: I am very happy there, the people with me are very nice.' (140501 jingli, 149)

src: nɯ tɤ-ŋu tɕe, aʑo ndɤre, ʁloŋbutɕhi sɤz ndɤre ɲɯ-scit-a tɕe a-kʰi ɲɯ-ŋgɯ
trs: Since it is like that, I am happier than the elephant, I am luckier than him.' (140425 shizi puluomixiusi he daxiang, 41)

src: χsɯ-xpa jɤ-tsu-j, nɯsthɯci ʑo scit-i, amɯmi-j
trs: We have been together for three years now, we are so happy together.' (Norbzang 2005, 95)
Let it/him/her eat/ if s/he/it eats

src: pja mɯndʐamɯχtɕɯɣ nɯ-skɤt a-pɯ-tɯ-tso smɯlɤm
trs: May you understand the speech of all species of birds!' (2003kandZislama, 85)

src: tɯrme ci a-nɯ-ɤpa-a kɯ
trs: If only I could become a human!' (150819 haidenver-zh, 242)

src: a-tʰɯ-ɣi, a-tʰɯ-ɣi
trs: Let him come, let him come (as he wishes).' (2003 Kunbzang, 41)

src: ɯ-ɲɯ́-wɣ-sat-a nɤ a-pɯ́-wɣ-nɯ-sat-a ma mɤ-pʰɣo-tɕi
trs: If she is to kill me let her kill me, we will not flee.' (2002nyimavodzer, 36)

src: pɤjkʰu a-tɤ-tɯ-mna, mɤʑɯ kɤ-rɤʑi
trs: (Wait till) you get better, stay a little more.' (said to a convalescent person who wants to leave the place where she is taken care of.'  (12-BzaNsa, 110)

src: a-mɤ-tɤ-tɯ-nɯtɕʰomba ra ma tɕe nɤ-ɕqʰe ɲɯ-tʰɯ ɲɯ-ŋu wo
trs: Don't catch a cold, otherwise you cough will be become even more serious.' (conversation 17-09-01)

src: andi ki stʰɯci smar kɯ-wxti iʑo kɤ-sɯ-βzɯr tɕʰi a-tɤ-stu-j?
trs: How can we move such a huge river? (2005 tAwakWcqraR, 210)

src: [kʰa kɤ-mto jɤ-tɯ-azɣɯt] tɕe qʰihihi χsɯ-ŋka a-tɤ-tɯ-ti ra
trs: When you arrive at visible distance of the house, say \forme{qʰihihi} three times.' (qachGa 2012, 164-165)

src: nɯ-tɯ-armbat-ndʑi tɕe, nɤ-mbro ɯ-jme zɯ pʰuɲi a-kɤ-tɯ-βraʁ, nɤʑo tɤ-muj stʰɯci a-tɤ-tɯ-ʑɣɤ-ɣɤ-ʑo, nɤ-mbro qale stʰɯci a-nɯ-ʑɣɤ-ɣɤ-mbjom
trs: When you approach (the boulders), attach a branch of \textit{Potentilla fruticosa} on the tail of your horse, make yourself as light as a feather, and may your horse be as quick as the wind.' (Smanmi2003.2, 60-61)

src: aʑo nɯ, qale jamar ʑo tu-ʑɣɤ-ɣɤ-mbjom-a nɤʑo nɯ tɤ-muj jamar tɤ-ʑɣɤ-ɣɤ-ʑo
trs: I will make myself as quick as the wind, make yourself as light as a feather.' (28-smAnmi, 117-119)

src: [nɯ wuma ʑo tu-ndze-a] ɲɯ-sɯsam-a
trs: I want to eat it a lot.' (140506 woju guniang-zh, 35)

src: χawo ʑo kɯ-dɯ\redp{}dɤn kɯ a-kɤ-nɯtsʰɤβ-nɯ tɕe a-tɤ-tɕʰɯ-nɯ tɕe, a-pɯ-sat-nɯ kɯ ɲɯ-sɯsam-a ri
trs: I am thinking that if only they attacked in pack and gored (the lion), they would probably kill it.' (20-RmbroN, 65-67)

src: ``nɯnɯ tɕe kɯ-xtɕɯ\redp{}xtɕi ci tu-tɕat-a tɕe nɯ a-tɤ-ndze" ɲɤ-sɯso
trs: He thought: `I will take a few (olives from the jar) so that she (can) eat some.' (140516 yiguan ganlan-zh, 42)

src: ``a-mi nɯnɯ a-tɤ-mna'' ɲɯ-sɯsam-a tɕe, nɯra ku-z-nɯsman-a ŋu.
trs: In order for my leg to get better, I am treating it (with footbaths).' (conversation 2013-11-12)

src: a-wɯ cʰo a-ʁi ni cʰɯ-ɣi-ndʑi ra ma  ʑɤni-sti kɤ-rɤʑi mɤ-cʰa-ndʑi tɕe, [a-tʰɯ-ɣi-ndʑi] ra
trs: My grandfather and younger brother have to come (with me), as they cannot stay on their own, let them come.' (2011-05-nyima 208-209)

src: ki ɲɯ-sɤ-ɕke tɕe, [a-nɯ-ɤfɕu] ɲɯ-ntsʰi
trs: This (tea) is too hot, let it cool down.' (elicited)

src: nɯ a-jɤ-ɕe tɕe tɕetʰa kɤ-zɣɯt mɤ-cʰa tɕe si ɕti tɕe
trs: Would he go there, he would not be able to reach (his goal), and would die.' (28-smAnmi, 60)

src: tɕiʑɤɣ nɯ kɯ-fse ci a-pɯ-tu ndɤre, kɯra kɯ-fse mɯ-pɯ-nɤŋkɯŋke-tɕi wo
trs: If we had (so many cattle and fields) like that, we would not be wandering around like that.' (2005 Kunbzang, 188)

src: kʰɤxtu ɕɯ-nɤʁaʁ-tɕi tɕe, [nɤ-kɤrme a-tɤ-zbaʁ]
trs: Let us go to the rooftop platform to rest, so that your hair can dry (after bathing).' (2002 qaCpa, 287)

src: [nɯ tɕʰi a-tɤ-fse] tɕe ɲɯ-pʰɤn
trs: How (should he do) to solve (this problem)?' (Divination 2005, 45)

src: [ɯ-ŋgɯ pjɯ-kɯ-ɕe tɕe tɯ-ku ci pjɯ́-wɣ-nɯ-sɤɕɤt, pjɯ́-wɣ-nɯ-χtɕi] a-pɯ-ŋu ndɤre, wuma ʑo sɤ-scit tʰaŋ nɤ!
trs: If one were to dive (in the water), comb and wash one's hair, it would be very nice!' (140515 congming de wusui xiaohai-zh, 25-27)

src: jɤ-ɕe!
trs: Go away!' (many examples)

src: toʁde tɕe jɤ-lɤt je ma a-<dianhua> ɯ-kɯ-lɤt ɣɤʑu
trs: Call me in a moment, there is someone calling me on the phone!' (conversation, 22-08-2018)

src: <guazi> tɤ-ndza-ndʑi
trs: Eat some melon seeds!' (conversation 14-05-10)

src: ``a-wi smi tʰɯ-sɤtɕɤt" tɤ-tɯt-a tɕe lɤ-rɤɕi, ``a-wi smi lɤ-rɤɕi" tɤ-tɯt-a tɕe tʰɯ-sɤtɕɤt ra
trs: When I say `grandmother, add firewood', remove the firewood, and when I say `grandmother, remove the firewood', add firewood.' (2005 Kunbzang, 370-371)

src: tɕe nɯnɯ ɕɤr tɕe tu-mbri tɕe ``coʁcoʁcóʁcoʁcoʁ coʁcoʁcóʁcoʁcoʁ" tu-ti ŋu tɕe, ``tɯ-sŋi tɯ-rtsɤɣ tɤ-mbro, tɯ-sŋi tɯ-rtsɤɣ tɤ-mbro" tu-ti ŋu tu-ti-nɯ ŋgrɤl.
trs: (In june, when crops are about to grow), (the \forme{tacoʁcoʁ} bird)$_i$ sings in the night, making the sound \forme{coʁcoʁcóʁcoʁcoʁ}, people say that it$_i$  tells (the crops) `Grow by one node everyday!'.' (23-scuz, 113-114)

src: laʁjɯɣ nɤʑo tɤ-nɯ-ndɤm je tɕe, aʑo jɤɣɤt ci lu-ɕe-a nɤ
trs: Take the staff, I am going to the toilets.' (2005 khu, 13)

src: nɯ-nɯ-nɤre ma nɤʑo qaɕpa nɤ-rʑaβ nɤ-kɯ-mbi kɯ-tu me
trs: Laugh as you wish, nobody will give you a wife, you frog.'   (2002 qaCpa, 176)

src: kɤnɤβdi je a-wɯ tɯɟo, a-qe kɯ-sɤ-ɕkɯ\redp{}ɕke ci tɤ-nɯ-ndze
trs: Farewell, old demon, eat my hot shit!' (2005 tWJo, 45)

src: [nɤʑo tɤ-nɯ-ndɤm] jɤɣ
trs: Please take it.' (divination, 84)

src: nɤ-kɤ-tʰu ɯ-ɣɤʑu nɤ, [tɤ-tʰe] jɤɣ
trs: If you have a question, please ask it.' (conversation, 14-11-08)

src: ɕ-tɤ-tʰe ra
trs: Go and ask him about it.' (divination, 8)

src: tɤ-mbɣom ʑo tɤ-ɕe ra
trs: Hurry up and go upstairs!' (160706 poucet6, 6)

src: kɯki tʂu ki ma-nɯ-tɯ-βde ʑo jɤ-ɕe
trs: Go along this way without leaving it!' (140507 jinniao-zh, 212)

src: nɯtɕu ma-nɯ-tɯ-te ma tɤ-pɤtso ra nɯ-sta ɕti
trs: Don't put her there, it is the place of the children.

src: ma-tɤ-kɯ-ndza-a tɕetʰa nɤ-χpi pjɯ-fɕat-a
trs: Don't eat me, and I will tell you a story.' (tWJo 2012, 62)

src: ʑa ma-tɤ-nɯna-tɕi qʰe
trs: (In order to catch up with the wasted time), we will not stop (working) early (today).' (conversation 14-05-10)

src: nɯ kʰramba ma-tɤ-βze-a ra ma
trs: I should not tell lies.' (27-kikakCi, 222)

src: tɕe tɯ-mdʑu ɯ-taʁ ma-nɯ-ɤtɕaʁ ra ma tɯ-mdʑu tu-sɤzoŋzoŋ ʑo qʰe cʰɯ-nɯɣmbɤβ ɕti.
trs: (The \textit{Arisaema consanguineum}) should not get on one's tongue$_i$, as it makes the tongue$_i$ numb, and it$_i$ swells.' (14-sWNgWJu, 145)

src: ma-tɤ-tɯ-raʁle, tɤ-ʑɣɤ-ɕɯ-fka je
trs: Please eat to your full!' (heard in context)

src: tɕetu tɤ-ari-tɕi tɕe, ɯ-tɯ-ɣɤndʐo saχaʁ ʑo ri, ``ɯtɕʰɯtɕʰɯ" ma-tɯ-ti
trs: When we go up there (in the sky, near the moon), it will be extremely cold, but then don't say `brbr'.' (07-deluge-64)

src: iɕqʰa rɯdaʁ ra kɯ ta-tɯt nɯra, tɯrme ɯ-ɕki a-mɤ-tɤ-tɯ-ti ma
trs: You will have to avoid telling human what the animal say.' (150902 hailibu-zh, 83)

src: ku-ɕe-a ɕi ma-kɤ-ɕe-a kɯ
trs: (I wonder) whether to go or not.' (elicited)

src: sɤtɕʰa kɯ-ɤrqʰi zɯ pjɯ́-wɣ-lɤt ma-pɯ́-wɣ-sat ra
trs: One has to take it far away (from the house) without killing it.' (2010-11, 11)

src: tɤ-mtʰɯm kɯnɤ kɤ-kɤ-sqa nɯra ʑatsa ma-tɤ́-wɣ-nɯβdaʁ qʰe, ɯ-taʁ ri kɯ-wɣrum ku-te
trs: In the case of meat also, if one fails to take care of cooked (meat) in time, white stuff will appear on it.' (20-sWrna,60)

src: nɯ sɤznɤ, nɤʑo kɯ ma-tɤ-kɯ-sɯ-ɕqraʁ-a kɯ pjɤ-mna!
trs: It would have been better if you had not made me smart!' (160711 riquet8-v2, 18)

src: ku-nɯ-pʰɤn mɯ-ku-nɯ-pʰɤn mɤ-xsi ma
trs: I don't know whether it efficient or not (as medicine).' (19-GzW, 108)

src: wo, nɯ ɕɯ ci ku-nɯ-ŋu kɯ?
trs: Who on earth is it (who does all) that?' (2014-kWLAG, 619)

src: tɤ-ɣe-j
trs: We came (up).' (many attestations)

src: ta-tɯt
trs: S/he said it.' (many attestations)

src: ɯ-jwaʁ rcanɯ pɯ-rom kɯnɤ ɯ-mdzu nɯ mɤʑɯ ʑo mtɕoʁ
trs: When its leaves have dried, the thorns (on the leaves) are even sharper.' (18-NGolo, 70)

src: nɯ kɯ-fse rcanɯ, <qibajin> ʑo tɤ-χtɯ-t-a. tɕe <dong> pɯ-βzu-t-a
trs: (Nettles) like that, I bought seven or eight pounds. Then I put them in the refrigerator.' (conversation, 14-05-10)

src: kutɕu hanɯni ɲɯ-ɣɤndʐo. jɯfɕɯɕɤr tɤjpa ka-lɤt. ka-lɤt ri mɯ-pɯ-wxti. jisŋi tɕe lonba to-ndʐi.
trs: Here it is a bit cold. Yesterday evening there was a snowfall. There was snow but not much, and now it has melted completely.' (conversation, 17-11-23)

src: nɯ-mu nɯ tɤ-ngo qʰe ci ci nɯ-si kɯ-fse ci ci tɤ-mna kɯ-fse qʰe kɯɕnɯ-xpa ʑo tʰɯ-mdɯ.
trs: Their mother got ill, and survived seven years, sometimes looking like she had died, sometimes looking like she was getting better.' (14-siblings, 32-33)

src: tɤ-jpum tɕe tɕendɤre tɯ-sŋi kʰro lú-wɣ-taʁ ɲɯ-kɯ-cʰa ma tɤ-xtsʰɯm tɕe tɕe, koŋla lú-wɣ-taʁ mɯ́j-sɤ-cʰa
trs: When (the threads) are thick, one can weave a lot in one day, when they are thin, it is not possible to weave.' (2011-06-thaXtsa, 54-55)

src: nɯʑo pɯ-tɯ-nɯ-ɣe-nɯ nɯtɕu cuparkʰɤrkʰɤt a-pɯ-tɯ-ɬoʁ-nɯ tɕe aʑo tʰɤlwa ɲɯɣɲɯɣ pjɯ-ɬoʁ-a ŋu
trs: When you come back, take the stone steps, I will come down on the soft earth.' (2014-kWlAG, 438)

src: a-ʁa tu ri, tɕetʰa nɯ-mbrɤt tɕe tɕe [a-<dian> nɯ-me] ndʐa ŋu
trs: I have time (to talk with you), but in a moment when (the phone line) disconnects, it will be because my (cellphone) is out of battery.' (conversation)

src: iɕqʰa [srɯnloʁ-pɯ kɯ-fse na-kʰo] nɯnɯ ko-ɕtʰɯz
trs: He$_i$ turned the little ring that (Smanmi Metog Koshana) had given him$_i$ in the direction (of the râkshasas). (28-smAnmi, 173)

src: [ɯ-pi kɯ tɯ\redp{}ta-stu] nɯ to-stu qʰe
trs: She did everything like her elder sister.' (2014-kWlAG, 167)

src: aʑo [nɯ-z-nɤre-t-a] pɯ-cʰa-a
trs: I succeeded in making her laugh.' (140430 jin e-zh, 179)

src: nɯ ʁmaʁ kɯ\redp{}kɯ-tu ʑo tʰɯ-sta-nɯ ɲɯ-ŋu.
trs: All the soldiers woke up.' (2003qachGa, 77)

src: iɕqʰa kɯ-rɯru ʁmaʁmi nɯra cʰɤ-sta-nɯ.
trs: The guards woke up.' (140507 jinniao-zh, 148)

src: tɕe [kɯ-wxti ni ndʑi-pʰe ta-tɯt] ri, [kɯ-wxti ni kɯ mɯ-ta-tɯt-ndʑi] ɲɯ-ŋu.
trs: He told it$_i$ to the two elder (sisters)$_j$, but they$_j$ did not tell it$_i$ (to their$_j$ parents).' (2005-stod-kunbzang, 35)

src: ``a-pi ɲɯ-ɕpaʁ-a" ti ɲɯ-ŋu
trs: She said: `Sister, I am thirsty.'' (2003 Kunbzang, 306)

src: [stu kɯ-xtɕi nɯ ɯ-pʰe ti] nɤ, [nɯ kɯ li ta-tɯt] ɲɯ-ŋu
trs: He told it$_i$ to the youngest (sister)$_j$, and she$_j$ told it$_i$ (to her parents).' (2003 Kunbzang, 56)

src: aʑo cʰa kʰro ko-tsʰi-t-a
trs: I drank a lot of alcohol.' (aesop zuoke de gou-zh, 36)

src: maka nɤ-βzaŋlɤn βze-a ra ma a-tɕɯ ɯ-sroʁ ko-tɯ-ri-t tɕe
trs: I have to return the favour, as you have saved my son's life.' (2011-04-smanmi, 49)

src: tɕe nɯ ɯ-qʰu tɕe tɕʰi to-ti-a?
trs: What did I say after that?' (140522 Kamnyu zgo, 221)

src: mɯ-to-ta-t-a
trs: I did not put (the tea on the oven).' (Conversation, 28-04-2018, Dpalcan)

src: koŋla tɯrme ɲɤ-k-ɤβzu-nɯ-ci
trs: (The puppets) became real people.' (150822 yan muouxi de ren-zh, 46)

src: nɤʑo pɣa ɲɤ-tɯ-ɤβzu ɕti tɕe
trs: You have become (transformed into) a bird.' (160630 abao-zh, 151)

src: kʰɤxtu ri pɯ-rɤʑi-a tɕe tɤ-mtʰɯm tu-ndze-a pɯ-ŋu ri, toʁde tɕendɤre qandʑɣi pjɤ-ɣi tɕe, nɯra mɯ-pɯ-tso-a tɕe, ndɤre a-jaʁ tɤ-mtʰɯm nɯnɯ ta-nɯ-mɟa tɕe
trs: I was on the terrace eating meat, and suddenly a falcon came down without me noticing, and took away the (piece of) meat in my hand.' (150909 qandZGi, 5-7)

src: tɕendɤre ʁnɯ-kuxtɕo to-sɯ-mtsʰɤt tɕe
trs: (The man) had filled two baskets (with the pears).' (chen-pear, 2)

src: nɯnɯ kɯ ɯ-paχɕi tɯ-kuxtɕo nɯ ja-nɯ-tsɯm
trs: (The boy) took away one basketful of pears.' (chen-pear, 5)

src: rgɤtpu nɯ pɯ-ɬoʁ ri, tɕe pjɤ-sɯχsɤl ri jo-nɯ-tsɯm ɕti tɕe ɯ-kɤpa maŋe,
trs: When the old man came down from the tree, he realized that (the pears) had been taken away, but could not do anything about it.' (chen-pear, 14)

imtwordshtml: neg-ifr-caus-be.boiling-pst:tr-1sg
src: tɯ-ci mɯ-to-sɯ-ɤla-t-a
trs: I did not put the water to boil.' (Conversation, 01-05-2018, Tshendzin)

src: a-kʰi ma kɯki koŋla nɯ ɲɤ-k-ɤtɯɣ-a-ci
trs: I am lucky, I (finally) met a real (Daoist master).' (150907 laoshandaoshi-zh, 37)

src: tɯrme ɣɯ ɯ-ʁjoʁ ɲɤ-k-ɤβzu-a-ci
trs: I have become a slave of the man.' (aesop ma he lu-zh, 29)

src: tɯ-ci kɤ-ta-t-a ri, <dian> mɯ-to-zwar-a
trs: I put the water (on the oven), but did not open the electricity.' (Conversation, 04-05-2018, Tshendzin)

src: mtsʰalu ko-ɣɤ-ndʑam-a ɲɯ-maʁ
trs: It is not the nettles that I warmed.' (Conversation, 07-05-2018, Tshendzin)

src: kɤ-nɯʑɯβ ko-rdal-a
trs: I overslept.' (elicitation)

src: ɲɤ-nɯ-jmɯt-a
trs: I forgot.' (many attestations)

src: jɯfɕɯr a-<dianhua> jɤ-tɯ-lɤt ri mɯ-pjɤ-mtsʰam-a, kʰa pɯ-a-ta tɕe
trs: Yesterday when you called (me) on the phone, I did not hear it, as (I was away and) had left the phone at home.' (conversation, 2015-06-18)

src: nɤʑo kɯ-fse a-ŋkʰor nɯ mɯ-pjɤ-mto-t-a
trs: I have never seen anyone like you among my subjects.' (Smanmi 2003-2, 347)

src: mɤʑɯ ʑo to-mpɕɤr
trs: (The Phoenix) became even more beautiful than before.' (150901 bainiaochaofeng-zh, 76)

src: [zdɯm kɯ-ɲaʁ nɯ cʰɤ-sɯ-jɣɤt] pjɤ-cʰa ɲɯ-ŋu.
trs: He succeeded in making the black cloud turn back.' (25-kAmYW, 70)

src: cʰɯ-mɤɕi-ndʑi mɯ-pjɤ-cʰa-ndʑi
trs: They were unable to become rich.' (Divination, 7)

imtwordshtml: pst.ipfv-trop-be.good-pst:tr-1sg
src: pɯ-nɤ-pe-t-a
trs: I used to like it.' (elicited)

src: rgɤnmɯ nɯ kɯ li iɕqʰa <yuwang> nɯ pjɤ-k-ɤsɯ-tʂɯβ-ci
trs: The old woman was sewing nets (like before).' (140430 yufu he tade qizi-zh, 297)

src: a-jaʁ ri li kɯkɯra ntsɯ pɯ-tu tɕe pɯ-dɤn. tɕeri nɯ ɯ-qʰu li iɕqʰa stu kɯ-mɤku nɯ-kɯ-ɬoʁ nɯ-nɯ-me qʰe tɕe ɲɤ-nɯ-me
trs: I had (warts) on my hand there, and there were a lot. But later, the (wart) that had first come out disappeared by itself, and (the rest) disappeared.' (24-pGArtsAG, 49-50)

src: jɯfɕɯr kʰɯ\redp{}kʰro ʑo jo-tɯ-lɤt ri mɯ-pjɤ-mtsʰam-a ma kʰamu pɯ-asɯ-βzu-a
trs: Yesterday you called (me) many times (on the phone), but I did not hear it, as I was cooking.' (conversation, 14-12-2018)

src: tɕʰeme nɯ-nɯkʰɤda-t-a ri, mɯ́j-pʰɤn, tɕe pɯ-nɯ-ɣɤwu ɕti
trs: I comforted the girl, but to no avail, she was still crying.' (2003 zrantCWtWrme, 61)

src: wuma ʑo pɯ-asɯ-ndza-ndʑi,  pɯ-pe jamar ʑo tɕe tɕendɤre, nɯnɯ, nɤki, kʰa nɯ ɣɯ ɯ-kɯm to-ɲɟɯ
trs: While/Right at the moment when they were eating (the sweets) in big quantity and were (enjoying it), the door of the house opened.' (140507 tangguowu-zh, 85-87)

src: nɤ-kʰa jɤ-ɣe-a ri, a-ku kɤ-nɯ-rpu-t-a
trs: When I came to your house, I bumped my head (on the door frame).' (elicited)

imtwordshtml: neg-pst.ipfv-auto-bump-pst:tr-1sg
src: nɤ-kʰa jɤ-ɣe-a ri, a-ku pjɯ-pʰaβ-a a-pɯ-ŋu tɕe mɯ-pɯ-nɯ-rpu-t-a.
trs: When I came to your house, if I had lowered my head, I wouldn't have bumped it (into the door frame).' (elicited)

src: tu-ndze pjɤ-ŋu
trs: S/he/it used to eat it/was eating it.' (many examples)

src: tɕʰeme ci pɯ-taʁ ɲɯ-ŋu
trs: A girl was weaving.' (2003 tWxtsa, 29)

src: ``ɕɯ kɯ nɯ-tɯ́-wɣ-mbi tɤ-ti ma mɤ-jɤɣ" kʰɯ-ti-nɯ.
trs: Who gave this to you, you must tell us.' (2003-kWBRa, 79)

src: sɯŋgɯ nɯtɕu, nɤkinɯ, wuma ʑo spjaŋkɯ kɯ-mtsɯr ci pjɤ-tu. tɕendɤre nɯnɯtɕu ɯ-kɤ-ndza aʁɤndɯndɤt pjɤ-k-ɤsɯ-ɕar-ci.
trs: In the forest, there was a wolf, and he was looking for food there everywhere?' (140428 xiaohongmao-zh, 29-30)

src: ɲɯ-tɯ-ɤ́<wɣ>z-nɯkʰramba
trs: S/he is cheating you.' (elicited)

src: ɯ-ŋga cʰɤ-ɴɢraʁ ldʐɤβldʐɤβ ʑo ri, ɲɯ-ɤ<nɯ>sɯ-ŋga
trs: His clothes are torn to shreds, but he is still wearing them.' (elicited)

src: ɯ-zda kɯ ɲɯ-ɤ́-wɣ-nɯ-nɤjo
trs: His$_i$ companion is waiting for him$_i$.' (elicited)

src: ɲɯ-kɯ-ɤsɯ-zgroʁ-a
trs: You are attaching me.' (elicited)

src: srɤz ɣɯ jɯm ku-osɯ-ɕar-i, lu χsɯ-xpa pɯ-ŋke-j pɯ-ra ri
trs: We are looking for the prince's wife, we had to walk for three years.'  (2003sras, 58)

src: akɯ <xianzhong> ri <chuzhong> ku-osɯ-βzjoz.
trs: She is reading junior high school at the district school.' (14-siblings, 370)

imt: \textsc{lnk} sun not.exist:\textsc{fact} \textsc{dem}:\textsc{loc} \textsc{lnk} cloud \textsc{ipfv}:\textsc{upstream}-come be:\textsc{fact} \textsc{lnk} \textsc{dem} \textsc{3sg}.\textsc{poss}-in \textsc{dem}:\textsc{pl} \textsc{indef}.\textsc{poss}-sky \textsc{sbj}:\textsc{pcp}-\textsc{emph}\redp{}be.small \textsc{emph} \textsc{prog}-release:\textsc{fact} \textsc{lnk} \textsc{lnk} \textsc{dem} mosquito really \textsc{emph} be.many:\textsc{fact}
src: ma tɤŋe me nɯtɕu tɕe, zdɯm lu-ɣi ŋu tɕe, nɯ ɯ-ngɯ nɯra, tɯ-mɯ kɯ-xtɕɯ\redp{}xtɕi ʑo asɯ-lɤt tɕe tɕe nɯnɯ βɣɤrtsʰi wuma ʑo dɤn.
trs: When the sun has not appeared (yet, in the morning), when clouds come, and there is a little rain, the mosquitoes are particularly many.' (25-RmArYWG, 38-39)

src: nɯnɯ qaprɤŋar kɯ zdɯm tu-tɕɤt ŋu tɕe tɯ-mɯ lɤt tu-ti-nɯ ŋgrɤl
trs: (The snake from) Qaprangar is releasing clouds, and it will rain.' (140522 Kamnyu zgo-zh, 335)

src: kɯki ɯ-mdoʁ ʑo asɯ-ndo.
trs: It has this colour.' (23-mbrAZim, 6)

src: aʑo kɯkɯre ri jɯɣi pɯ-asɯ-rtoʁ-a ɕti tɕe, maka pɯ-mto-t-a maka me
trs: I was here reading books, I did not see anything.' (150901 dongguo xiansheng he lang-zh, 60-61)

imt: \textsc{interj} \textsc{dem} before other medicine \textsc{dem} \textsc{sbj}:\textsc{pcp}-be.like calcium.tablet \textsc{pst}.\textsc{ipfv}-exist \textsc{dem} \textsc{pst}.\textsc{ipfv}-\textsc{prog}-eat-\textsc{1sg} \textsc{lnk} \textsc{dem} \textsc{aor}-be.finished.up only.then \textsc{add} \textsc{2sg} aor:east-2-\textsc{caus}-bring \textsc{dem} \textsc{ipfv}-eat[III]-\textsc{1sg}  \textsc{2sg} aor:east-2-\textsc{caus}-bring \textsc{dem} calcium.tablet \textsc{sens}-be \textsc{sfp} \textsc{lnk} \textsc{dem} \textsc{prs}-\textsc{prog}-eat-\textsc{1sg}
src: woja nɯ ɕɯŋgɯ kɯmaʁ smɤn, nɯnɯ kɯ-fse <gaipian> pɯ-tu nɯnɯ pɯ-asɯ-ndza-a. tɕe nɯ tʰɯ-arɕo koʁmɯz nɤ, nɤʑo kɤ-tɯ-sɯ-ɣɯt nɯ tu-ndze-a. nɤʑo kɤ-tɯ-sɯɣɯt nɯnɯ, <gaipian> ɲɯ-ŋu ɣe, tɕe nɯ ku-osɯ-ndza-a.
trs: Before that I had another medicine, (another) calcium tablet like that, and it was the one I was taking. I (started) taking the (medicine) you have sent me when (the previous one) was finished up. The (medicine) you have sent me, calcium tablet, I am taking it (now).' (conversation 17-08-21)

src: tɕe [tɤ-pɤtso ra kɯ az-nɯrdoʁ-nɯ ɯ-raŋ] ʑo tɕe tɕendɤre, ʑɤni daltsɯtsa ɲɤ-ʑɣɤ-sɯ-ɤrqʰi-ndʑi tɕe
trs: While the children were collecting (firewood, piece by piece), (their parents) slowly moved away (from them).' (160630 poucet1, 48)

src: a-tɤ-lu to-χtɯ-ndʑi, a-paχɕi ra to-χtɯ-ndʑi, <gongxun> kɯ iʑo ji-skɤt ɲɯ-ɤsɯ-βzu tɕe, `nɤ-tɤ-lu cʰo nɤ-paχɕi tɤ-χtɯ-tɕi' nɯra ɲɯ-ti.
trs: They bought milk and apples for me, and Gong Xun (\zh{龚勋}) said, speaking in our language: `We bought milk and apples for you'.' (conversation, 17-08-21)

src: ɯ-nmaʁ nɯ japandʐi ri, wuma ʑo tɤ-ngo tɕe zɯmi ʑo jɯ-nɯ-si
trs: Her husband became sick a few years ago, and almost died.' (14-siblings, 356)

src: zɯmi jɯ-pɯ́-wɣ-sat-a.
trs: He almost killed me.' (150901 dongguo xiansheng he lang-zh, 139-141)

src: ɯ-lu ʑo jɯ-pjɤ-cɯ, tɯ-mu kɯ
trs: He almost fainted out of fear.' (150909 hua pi-zh, 73)

src: χsɯ-tɤxɯr jɯ-ko-ɕe ʑo tɕe,  tɕe tɕe, nɯ ma mɯ-ɲɤ-cʰa tɕe
trs: He almost completed (was about to complete) the third lap, but could not (run) any more.' (2003sras 110-111)

src: jɯ-nɯʑɯβ ʑo ɲɯ-ŋu
trs: He is about to fall asleep.' (elicited)

src: jɯ-atar-a ʑo ɲɯ-ŋu
trs: I am about to fall down.' (elicited)

src: kɯ-pɣi ci koŋla ʑo zɯmi jɯ-tu-kɯ-wɣrum kɯ-fse ci ɲɯ-ŋu.
trs: It is grey, almost like it is about to become white.'  (24-ZmbrWpGa, 34)

src: ɯnɯnɯ ɯ-ndʑɯɣ nɯnɯ a-pɯ-tu tɕe tɕendɤre, pɣa ra jɯ-ɕ-ku-zo-nɯ tɕe tɕe kú-wɣ-ndo-nɯ tɕe pjɯ-si-nɯ pjɯ-ŋgrɤl ɲɯ-ŋu.
trs: If its resin appeared, birds would get stuck by it as soon as they land (on the tree) and would die.' (140427 yanzi yu niaolei-zh, 9)

src: ʁdɯxpa naχpu ɣɯ ɯ-tɕɯ kɯ a-tɕɯ sat pɯ-ŋu ri, ɲɤ-tɯ-sɤtɯta-t tɕe
trs: The son of Klu gdugpa nagpo was about to kill (almost killed) my son, but you separated them.' (28-smAnmi, 280)

src: wo a-wɤmɯ ra mɤ-tɯ-ɣi-nɯ ɯ́-ŋu ma, kɯ-ndza ɲɯ-ŋu
trs: My brothers, aren't you coming, (the râkshasî) is about to eat us!' (28-smAnmi, 399)

src: sɤ-rŋgɯ\redp{}rŋgɯ kɯnɤ tɯ-kɤrnoʁ ɲɯ-mtɕɯr tɕe, ``atar-a ɲɯ-ŋu" kɤ-sɯso ʑo ntɕʰɤr
trs: Even lying down, your head is dizzy, and it feels like you are about to fall down.' (29-tAmtshAzkAkWndo, 57-58)

src: kɯki χɕɤl ɲɯ-ɕti tɕe, nɯ fse laχtɕʰa ɯ-ŋgɯ cʰɯ-tɯ-rke tɕe ɕɯ-ɴɢrɯ kɯ!
trs: This is (made of) glass, if you put it like that in something else, I am afraid it will break.' (elicited)

src: a-tɕɯ nɯ kɯ kʰɯtsa ta-ndo tɕe, ɕa-nɯ-qrɯ kɯ!
trs: My son took the bowl, I am afraid that he will break it.' (elicited)

src: tɯ-mɯ ɕa-lɤt kɯ
trs: I am afraid that it will rain.' (elicited)

src: nɯ ɕɯ-tɯ-nɤma-t kɯ
trs: I am afraid that you will do that.' (elicited)

src: ɕɯ-tɯ-tɯt kɯ
trs: I am afraid that you will say it.' (elicited)

src: ɕɯ-a<nɯ>ri kɯ
trs: I am afraid that he will go away.' (elicited)

src: [nɤʑo stɤβtsʰɤt ci mɯ-ɕɯ-tɯ-cʰa] ɲɯ-sɯsam-a tɕe, nɯ ɲɯ-nɯzdɯɣ-a wo
trs: I fear that you will not succeed in the contest, this is what I am worried about.' (2003sras, 95)

src: [ɕɯ-maqʰu-a kɯ ʑo] ɲɤ-sɯso-nɯ tɕe rcanɯ, pɕoʁʑi kɯβde ʑo jo-ɣi-nɯ.
trs: Fearing of being late (thinking `I am afraid that I will be late'), they came from the four corners of the world.' (150906 toutao, 19)

src: mɯ-ɕɯ-kʰɯ kɯ nɯ-sɯso-t-a
trs: I thought it would not work.'  (conversation, 02-05-2018; after opening a washing machine, expecting it would not open)

src: ɕɯ-kɯ-mpɕa-a kɯ!
trs: I am afraid that you will scold me.' (elicited)

src: cʰa-a ɕi mɤ-cʰa-a mɤ-xsi, pɤjkʰu xtɕi-a ɕti
trs: I don't know whether I will be able to do it, I am still young.' (2010-09, 105-106)

src: ɯmɤ-jɤ-azɣɯt
trs: He probably has already arrived.' (elicited)

src: tɕi-ɬaʁ nɯnɯ, tɕi-taʁ ɯmɤ-pe
trs: (Now that we have money), maybe our stepmother will treat us better.' (140507 tangguowu-zh, 155)

src: nɤ-ja ndʑi-ɕki tɤ-tɯt-a ri, mɯ-ta-tɯt-ndʑi ɯmɤ-ŋu ma
trs: I have told it to your two elder sisters, but they presumably have not told (your parents) about it (since they have not given any answer).' (2014-kWlAG, 106)

imt: night \textsc{loc} \textsc{ipfv}-cry \textsc{lnk} \textsc{interj} \textsc{ipfv}-say be:\textsc{fact} \textsc{lnk} \textsc{dem} pheasant be:\textsc{fact} pheasant be:\textsc{fact} \textsc{ipfv}-say-\textsc{pl} be:\textsc{fact} \textsc{lnk} \textsc{prob}-be:\textsc{fact} \textsc{lnk} \textsc{neg}-\textsc{genr}:know:\textsc{fact} \textsc{lnk} night \textsc{loc} \textsc{neg}:\textsc{sens}-\textsc{prop}-see \textsc{lnk}
src: ɕɤr tɕe tu-mbri tɕe, ``qaqaqaqa" tu-ti ŋu tɕe nɯnɯ pɣɤɲaʁ ŋu. ``pɣɤɲaʁ ŋu" tu-ti-nɯ, ŋu tɕe ɯmɤ-ŋu ma mɤ-xsi matɕi ɕɤr ndɤre mɯ́j-sɤ-mto tɕe.
trs: It sings at night, it makes the sound \forme{qaqaqaqa}, that is the pheasant \textit{Pucrasia macrolopha}. They say it is the \textit{Pucrasia macrolopha}, maybe it is, we don't know, in the night it is not visible.' (23-pGAYaR, 8-11)

src: pɣa ra kɯ tu-ndza-nɯ ɯmɤ-kɯ-ŋu-ci ma
trs: Maybe birds eat it.' (17-thowum, 39)

src: alo tɕu rgɯnba ci ɣɤʑu ɯmɤ-kɯ-ŋu-ci tɕe
trs: It looks like there is a temple up there.' (2003 Kunbzang, 229)

src: ɯmɤ-cʰɯ-mɤɕi-a
trs: If only I could become rich!' (elicited)

src: ``iɕqʰa rɟɤlpu ɯ-tɕɯ nɯ ɯmɤ-pjɯ-mtam-a" ntsɯ ɲɯ-sɯsɤm pjɤ-ŋu.
trs: She was thinking all the time: `If only I could see the prince!'' (150819 haidenver-zh, 154)

src: ``nɯ-kʰi ɣe" ti qʰe,
trs: She said: `They are so lucky.' (to have so many cattle).

src: ``tɕiʑɤɣ ɯmɤ-pjɯ-ŋu nɤ lɤ-ɣi wo!" ntsɯ tu-ti pɯ-ŋu ɲɯ-ŋu.
trs: He said each time: `Maybe (these cattle) will be ours, come.' (2005 Kunbzang, 193-195)

src: rcanɯ mti pjɯrɯ ʁɟa ʑo tɤrɤmɕkʰo pɯ-ŋu ɲɯ-ŋu. `nɯ a-mi pjɯ-te-a ri ɯβrɤ-sqlɯm ma' na-sɯso ɲɯ-ŋu
trs: The floor was all tiled with and turquoise and coral. She thought `If I tread on it, it will not yield under my weight, will it?'' (2005 Kunbzang, 221)

src: tɯrmɯkʰa nɤ nɯ-βɣo jɤ-azɣɯt nɤ ``joβ ɯβrɤ-ɕ-tɤ-tɯ-tɯt-nɯ?" ti ɲɯ-ŋu.
trs: In the evening, their lama arrived and said: `You did not go and say \forme{joβ} (to the girl), did you?' (2003kandZislama, 22)

src: a-mu, jɯɣmɯr tɕe kʰu ɯβrɤ-ɣi ɣe!
trs: Mother, the tiger will come this evening (to eat us), isn't?' (X1-khu, 3)

src: pʰɤn ɯβrɤ-pjɯ-tu-a ri ʁdɯɣ nɯ ɯβrɤ-pjɯ-tu-a tɕe tɤ-rca cʰɯ-ɣi-a je
trs: Even if I am of no use at least I will not do any harm, let me come along!' (X1-tWJo, 43)

src: aʑo cʰɯ-ɣi-a je ma mɤ-pʰan-a nɤ mɤ-ʁdɯɣ-a tʰaŋ nɤ
trs: Let me come along, (even) if I am of no use, I will not do any harm.' (several occurrences)

src: kʰro ɯβrɤ-kɯ-pe-ci
trs: (What you are proposing) does not look nice (fair).' (140506 nongfu he mogui-zh, 69)

src: ʁloŋbutɕʰi nɯ, ɯ-rme ra ɯβrɤ-kɯ-tu-ci
trs: The elephant, it seems that it does not have hair (on its body).' (19-RloNbutChi, 9)

src: kɯki ɲɯ-tɯ-kʰɤm ɯ́-jɤɣ
trs: Could you pass (me) this thing?' (2003, conversation taRrdo)

src: nɤj ɯ-tɯ́-sɯz?
trs: Do you know it?' (19-GzW, 8)

src: ``nɤ-nmaʁ nɯ a-tɤ-sɯsu'' ɯ-ɲɯ́-tɯ-sɯsɤm nɤ, kɯki tɤ-ndze
trs: If you want your husband to live, eat this!' (150909 hua pi-zh, 182)
